q: readymade response to the haters: they show he's right.`` Doing anything remotely interesting will bring criticism,'' he says in a blogpost, The Benefits Of Pissing People Off, quoting Colin Powell . Pissing people off is both inevitable and necessary. He will now be traveling across the state to listen and learn about how Hoosiers think we might best contribute in the years ahead. That begins Friday. Mike Pence , who flew today to Indiana from Washington, is holding a town hall meeting in Pendleton at 10 a.m. and speaking to Muncie Central High School students at 1:20 p.m.

In October, Sergio Marchionne ignited controversy when he said that Fiat would be better off if it eliminated Italy . Trade unions and politicians accused him of`` blackmail'' in pushing through a tough deal on working conditions at Fiat's flagship Mirafiori plant in Turin to save the factory from closure. American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like,` What just happened?'?
